company_name: Ponleu Odom Import & Export Co., Ltd
Job Description: Ponleu Odom Import & Export Co., Ltd need qualify  Marketing employees. In our company serve as Medicals and Cosmetic and now we are seeking Marketing staff to respond as Medical Marketing and Cosmetic.
Job Requirement:
* Medical Marketing : 
- At least graduated BA from medical University 
- Have good relationship with other Departments such as Marketing & Sales
- Have experience is priority if have no experience also can apply CV 
- Have medical education background and sufficient knowledge on products or medical fields
- Have capability to solve the problem internally and externally related to responsible products that sometimes need a practical judgment
- Have a good communication skill 
* Cosmetic Marketing: 
- If have no experience also can apply we can train to be a good Marketing
- If have Experience is priority
- Must be honest, work hard, flexible, and responsible with duties
- At least Graduate BA from university 
- Have good relationship with other Departments such as Marketing & Sales
- Have a good communication skill
